message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe I can offer you a fair price of $8000.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $9000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand your position and would like to propose a price of $8500 for your product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $9250.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $8750 for your product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still trying to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9375.
Thank you for your continued negotiation efforts, Alice. Based on our discussions, I would like to propose a price of $8900 for your product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still trying to find a sweet spot. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. Based on our discussions and considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $9000 for your product.
